alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wabash; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 8:19PM CST until January 11 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .Recent heavy rains in the Ohio River basin are expected to cause continued rises in the river levels this week. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY, JANUARY 11... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until Tuesday, January 11. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The river overflows low ground on the Illinois side. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Monday the stage was 15.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.5 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday, January 11. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
